Package entities

Class Tomb

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Tomb
public class Tomb extends Entity
created by the enemies when dying, updates the score and starts the animation of death

    Tomb(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, String type, int level, int x, int y, int width, int height)
